title: Add new Solr book 'Solr Cookbook - Third Edition' to selection of Solr books and news.
description:
Rafał Kuć is proud to finally announce the book Solr Cookbook - Third Edition by Packt Publishing. This edition will specifically appeal to developers who wish to quickly get to grips with the changes and new features of Apache Solr 5. 
Solr Cookbook - Third Edition has over 100 easy to follow recipes to solve real-time problems related to Apache Solr 4.x and 5.0 effectively. Starting with vital information on setting up Solr, the developer will quickly progress to analyzing their text data through querying and performance improvement. Finally, they will explore real-life situations, where Solr can be used to simplify daily collection handling.
With numerous practical chapters centered on important Solr techniques and methods Solr Cookbook - Third Edition will guide intermediate Solr Developers who are willing to learn and implement Pro-level practices, techniques, and solutions.
Click here to read more about the Solr Cookbook - Third Edition: http://bit.ly/1Q2AGS8

comments.author: Steve Rowe
comments.content:
I have committed the patch, but made two changes: 


	I moved the new book below "Apache Solr Enterprise Search Server, 3ed", because we order the books by publication date, and "Solr Cookbook 3ed" was published earlier (ASESS3: 2015-05-26; SC3: 2015-01-23).
	I added linked book cover images for both ASESS3 and SC3 to the Solr website front page.  Since the layout has room for a fixed number of books (6), I removed the two oldest books: "Solr 4 Cookbook" and "Taming Text".



Rafał Kuć, do you want to keep the older editions of your book on the books page?  Either way is fine with me.  Note that they are still there now.

comments.author: Rafał Kuć
comments.content: Thanks a lot for the commit and the changes  As for the books, I see all the others are there, so let's leave it as it is.
